snippet.title: Cubicle Cat Superstar! Trailer
snippet.description:
TOTAL. DONUT. DEFENSE.
for Android and iPhone.

Working overtime becomes a true test of willpower when there is the ever present threat of juicy, sugar drenched donuts all over the office. 
Stout office worker Cubicle Cat needs all the mind-control powers he can muster to defend himself from the devious chocolate assault on his self discipline. And he needs your help.

"Cubicle Cat Superstar" is a fast paced reaction defense/survival game. Shoot down any incoming foe by tapping the donut buttons according to the direction of attack - when within range. And try to survive until the timer runs out. Should any donut ever reach your cubicle - game over.

"Cubicle Cat Ultra Superstar" is the full version of "Cubicle Cat Superstar". With no ads and fully unlocked upgrades and buffs.

FEATURES:
- 50 levels of ever increasing length, speed and enemy quantity.
- 3 types of enemy (mass assault donuts, super fast vicious chocolate chip cookie boss rounds, and monstrous cup cakes that require special long press attacks).
- Upgrades and buffs (weapons range, more lives, vision range, replay lost rounds, and more).
- Save game functionality.
- Online leader board.
